fulltext:
Nguyen Tien Hiep
Software Engineer
 tienhiep11@gmail.com
  0986671195
  32A Dien Bien Phu street,Ward 25,Binh Thanh District,HCMC
SKILL HIGHLIGHTS
- Fluent in English as a working language.
- Fluent in C/C++, Python, Bash script.
- Good problem analysis skills.
- Experience in OpenCV.
- Knowledge in Deep learning and Machine learning algorithms.
- Linux and Embedded Development.
- Agile/Scrum methodology
DEK Technologies VietNam
Oct 29, 2018 - Now
CBA Support Engineer
Project: CBA Support.
This project will support customers who are using CBA components to
develop their applications, answer their questions through JIRA. Analysis the
problems and figure out the root cause, provide work around solution to help
overcome the issues and confirmation the issues are bug or not to create
Trouble Reports.
Role: team member.
Activities:
- Working on JIRA. 
- Trouble shooting the problems to find out root cause about Core
Middleware and related projects.
- Solving the problem or cooperate with designer to find out the solution.
Technologies:
- C/C++, Python, Bash script.
- GDB, Valgrind, Docker.
- Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Jira.
- Linux environment.
DEK Technologies VietNam
July 3, 2017 - Oct 28, 2018
Software Engineer
Project : Core Middleware
The whole project will provide functionality as high availability, scalability and
independent components. Therefore the applications can reuse these
functions for their project, not only reduce development time but also have
high availability applications.
Role: team member.
Activities:
- Development and maintenance for CoreMW application.
- Solving Trouble Reports, support customers for trouble shooting and
learning new features.
Technologies:
- C/C++, Python, Bash script.
- GDB, Valgrind, Docker.
WORK EXPERIENCE
- Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Jira.
- Linux environment.
FPT Software Company Limited
Dec 1, 2016 - Feb 28, 2017
Internship - on job trainning
Project: Build a backend server for a website application.
This project build a backend server for a website application for Japan customer.
Role : Internship.
Activities:
- Design and development a simple website for educational purpose.
- Learning about Yii2 framework.
Technologies:
- HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP
- MySQL, Yii2 framework.
University of Technology Ho
Chi Minh City
Oct 2013 - April 2018
Major: Electronic and Telecommunication Engineering
GPA: 7.20
Mini Thesis 2
Feb 2017 - June 2017
Face detection with IP Camera
This project used OpenCV library for face detection with IP Camera. Using
QT framework for creating GUI and cross-compile from Ubunto to
FriendlyArm environment. The application worked smoothly at 5-10 fps.
Team size : 1
Activites:
- Research, design and development this system.
Technologies:
- C/C+ programming language.
- OpenCV library
- QT framework
- FriendlyArm Tiny 4412 stanalone embedded systems.
- Linux environment.
Thesis
Sep 2017 - Jan 2018
Real-time Lane Detectiotn and Tracking System.
This project used OpenCV library and releted algorithms to detecting
tracking lanes. Using Thread Building Blocks (TBB) library to speed up real-
time processing. The application worked smoothly at 10-15fps on Raspberry
Pi 3.
Team size : 1
Activities:
- Research, design and development this system.
Technologies:
- C/C+ programming language.
- Multithreading programming
- OpenCV, TBB libraries.
- Raspberry Pi 3 embedded system.
- Linux environment.
EDUCATION
Jan 2015
Completed the course "Entrepreneurs Leadership Program" of BSSC (Business
Startup Support Centre).
CERTIFICATIONS
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
